mapper.sql: z_id, gmt_create, gmt_modified, s_id, s_toid, z_name, z_cat, z_desc, z_hot, z_pic, z_state
mapper.select: select from Travel_Column where z_id = #{zId, jdbcType = INTEGER}
select from Travel_Column ORDER BY z_Desc DESC
mapper.insert:
SELECT Travel_Column_SEQ.NEXTVAL AS zId FROM DUAL
insert into TRAVEL_COLUMN ( ) values (#{zId},SYSTIMESTAMP,SYSTIMESTAMP, #{sId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sToId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{zName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zCat, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{zDesc, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{zHot, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{zPic, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zState, jdbcType=INTEGER} )
mapper.update: update TRAVEL_COLUMN set gmt_Modified = SYSTIMESTAMP, z_state = 1 where z_id = #{zId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update TRAVEL_COLUMN set gmt_Modified = SYSTIMESTAMP,
z_Name = #{zName, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
z_Cat = #{zCat,jdbcType=INTEGER},
z_Hot = #{zHot,jdbcType=INTEGER},
z_Desc = #{zDesc,jdbcType=INTEGER},
z_Pic = #{zPic,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
z_State = #{zState,jdbcType=INTEGER}
where z_id = #{zId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
